episode.title: City of Philadelphia v. New Jersey

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In 75-1150, the City of Philadelphia and others against New Jersey for reasons stated in an opinion of the Court filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the New Jersey Supreme Court is vacated and the case is remanded for reconsideration in light of the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act of 1976, Mr. Justice Powell with whom Mr. Justice Stewart, Mr. Justice Rehnquist and I joined and filed a dissenting opinion.
